name: React portfolio
description: A sample portfolio site utilizing React instead of Sveltekit. Utilizes Sanity CMS to display data and showcases higher order components

name: Link Tree clone
description: Clone tree is a Full Stack CRUd application utilizing Sveltekit & Firebase to create a fully featured web app that allows users to create accounts linked to their gmail account and share all their social media links.

name: Ultimate Todos
description: Ultimate Todos is a Full Stack Next.js, Node.js + Express.js & Firebase CRUD application that allows a user to login, manage a tidy and efficacious todo list, and persist this information across devices.

name: Pokedex
description: The Pokédex is a SvelteKit & TailwindCSS web application, hosted on Netlify, that consumes and caches the Pokémon API to display all Pokémon information. Gotta catch them all!
